author: ryanleeschneider
content:
> Mechanisms for storing different receipts will be needed in London

Because of -1559 or some other change coming in London?

author: lightclient
content: Technically, 1559 introduces a new receipt type but (now) the payload is the same as 2030, so should be trivial to support

author: ryanleeschneider
content: Ah gotcha, I forgot that 2930 (or rather 2718) added the `type` field to receipts as well as txs.
